title: Happy if You Died
sinopse: One day after a company dinner party, Luda ends up helping her drunken boss, Chief Baek. The inconsiderate Baek suddenly runs towards the street and dies when he is hit by a truck. Luda, who witnesses this scene, wishes, "If only this was all a dream instead..." And then the next morning... strangely, everything that happened the day before started repeating! Will Luda be able to escape from this time loop?!
